English: With our monarch on the English throne, the idea of Unification even over the channel has been present ,with this new age we have decided to finally unite our Nations
Over the Channel
West Expansion
We long have focused on the eastern coast of the adriatic now with our tight hold ist time to look west.
Demand Milan
We should get Milan as it has no right being under german ownership
A Greater Genoa ?
With our slow rise we could now make a move to claim surrounding italian lands
Expand along the Coast
We long have focused on the far west and the Americas now with our tight hold is time to look at our own paninsular , espiacially the eastern coast.
Down the Nile
Since our Rebelion the Barbarians fled south.We werent able to beat them at the time , but we should go dow the nile and legitimize our kingdom once and for all
A national Guard
Whilest our Corsaire force does the job well , it is time to legitimise our state by getting a true united and standing army
Reclaim North Africa
With our resurgions it's time to return to our former , almost forgotten glory.We have to go up north and beat the barbarians
The Frisia question
With our Realm united.It is time to strive for our lost lands.Lets look east to frisia.
Down the danube
The Danube has been an intrical part of our nation for a millenia
Conquest of Syria
With our growing might we should make a push into the Orient
Into the holy land
With our growing might we should make a push into the Levant
Recruit militias
Our army is just petty.We need militia's to protect our country's
Unite Hessen
For centurys our land has been fragmented although we are twin, same dialects ,same history same culture.So lets la claim to this land and unite Hessen !
Claim Swabia
We may not understand them ,but the Swabians are closer to us Barians than any over neighbour
Along the Rhine
With our strong location in the Rhineland we could push for complete hegemony and go down the rhine 'til the Alps
Hegemon of Swabia
With our Swabian nature we could lay claim to Sigmaringen and Augsburg to complete our nation
Unite Poland and Lithuania
With our close ties between us and Lithuania it could be a smart idea to officially merge both.We have come to this point before ,but decided not to. Our court now questions this decisions.
Unite with hungary
Although we have closer ties to Lithuania uniting with Hungary could be a smart and stragetic move
From City to State
For long we have been kept under the water but now we shal rise from the dephts and go to the mountains of Olypus
Last Crusade

Our Power long forgotten the last thing we can do is a last push, a crusade ,like in the olden days where brave crusaders conquered the holy land… and … ahem… sacking a bit…  .Lets revive this tradition a last time and with modern technology a lasting time aswell
Call for the last Crusade
News reached us from the vatican.They castet a spell long forgotten, Deus Vult, the Pope stated.We have a religious reason to join ,but also a strategic one
Der Deutsche Zoll Verein
To bring more german unity and be more efficient we should start  a costum union
Deutscher Zoll Verien
Whilest we were never part of the Holy Roman Empire.Its of great intrest to us to join the german monitary union
Unite the Copts
We should do that.We have long been seperated but we areboth coptic nations
The Murano purchase
We long are in need of a near port.So lets ask our neighbour Venice
The Nord Afrika Kompanie
With our new port, we could encourage a settlement and company in North Africa
A Danish Pommerania
With our position we could go after Pommerania and have a tighter grip on the Baltic and Northern Germany
A Swedish Pommerania
With our position we could go after Pommerania and have a tighter grip on the Baltic and Northern Germany
